summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Camp Baraisa management system new features. Backend: 29/29 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All requested features verified working. Fixed a bug in Settings.js where SelectItem had empty string values causing runtime errors.
passed_tests: Backend: Health check API working
Backend: Admin login with credentials admin@campbaraisa.com/testpassword123
Backend: Groups API - Create, Read, Update, Delete for all 5 types (shiur, transportation, trip, room, custom)
Backend: Groups filtering by type
Backend: Fee calculation API - 3.5% credit card processing fee
Backend: Activity log API - get logs and add notes
Backend: Settings API - get and update settings
Backend: Email templates API - CRUD operations with auto triggers
Backend: Parent Portal API - access with token
Backend: Kanban API - get board with 10 status columns
Frontend: Admin login works correctly
Frontend: Rooms & Groups page loads with 5 group type categories (Shiur/Class, Transportation, Trip Group, Room/Bunk, Custom Group)
Frontend: Create Group dialog shows Group Type selector with all 5 types
Frontend: Settings page has Integrations tab with API Keys section
Frontend: API Keys section has fields for Gmail, Twilio, Jotform, Stripe
Frontend: Parent Portal shows 3.5% credit card processing fee when making payment
Frontend: Payment dialog shows fee breakdown (Payment Amount, Processing Fee 3.5%, Total Charge)
Frontend: Templates tab shows template list with Add Template button
Frontend: Create Template dialog has Automatic Trigger dropdown with auto options
Frontend: Kanban page shows enrollment pipeline with camper cards
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed: Settings.js had SelectItem components with empty string values ('') which caused runtime errors. Changed to 'none' and 'sample' values respectively.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features are working: Groups API with 5 types, 3.5% fee calculation in Parent Portal, API Keys in Settings (Gmail, Twilio, Jotform, Stripe), Templates with auto trigger options. Fixed SelectItem empty value bug in Settings.js. Kanban shows 2 test campers in Accepted status.

rooms_groups_page.details: Shows 5 group type categories with icons: Shiur/Class (purple), Transportation (blue), Trip Group (green), Room/Bunk (orange), Custom Group (gray). Create Group dialog has type selector.

settings_api_keys.details: Integrations tab has API Keys & Credentials section with fields for Gmail API Credentials, Twilio SMS Credentials (Account SID, Auth Token, Phone Number), Jotform Integration (API Key, Form ID), Stripe Payment Keys (Secret Key, Publishable Key)

parent_portal_fee.details: Payment dialog shows 3.5% credit card processing fee breakdown: Payment Amount, Processing Fee (3.5%), Total Charge. Example: $1500 + $52.50 fee = $1552.50

templates_lightning_bolt.details: Templates with auto triggers (status_accepted, status_paid_in_full, payment_reminder, invoice_sent) will show Zap (lightning bolt) icon. Current 'Acceptance email' template doesn't have auto trigger set.

admin_login.details: Login with admin@campbaraisa.com / testpassword123 works correctly

kanban_page.details: Shows enrollment pipeline with 10 status columns, 2 test campers in Accepted status with Call/SMS/Email buttons
